common:title: Title
common:name: Name
common:filter:naver-pay: Whether or not to use Naver Pay
common:filter:tip_box: If the option setting of the product does not match the actual number of options registered in the product option, it will be displayed as an error.
common:filter:open-the-information: Open the information provision notification management window
common:filter:promo-codenames: Codenames are not exposed to users for admin information
common:filter:promo-discount-condition: If you select the discount amount (KRW), the discount is applied as much as the set amount. If the total amount of the product is less than the discount rate, the discount is applied as much as the total amount of the product.
common:filter:promo-remind: Customers can apply a promo code when placing an order and must use it within the expiry date.
common:filter:checkbox:related-product: They are exposed in random order.
common:filter:tip-box:open-the-informati: It is registered as the items and contents of the information provision notice required for the product, and the registered contents are exposed on the product detail page
common:filter:tip-box:open-more-options-: Please do not change options for products with order history
common:filter:tip-box:open-option-window: Please do not change options for products with order history.
common:filter:tip-box:set-hashtags-botto: You can select an auto-completed hashtag by entering one or more characters of a hashtag registered in another product.
You can add hashtags after entering them by separating them with commas (,).
common:filter:common: [Common] Mailing top logo (width 280 or less x height 70 or less, 1 piece)
common:filter:banner-pc-1: [PC] Common: Top logo (width less than 200 x height less than 25, 1 piece)
common:filter:banner-pc-2: [PC] Common: QR code at the top (58 x 58, 1 pc)
common:filter:banner-pc-3: [PC] Main: Main Visual Banner (1,800 x 400, Unlimited Slide Type)
common:filter:banner-pc-4: [PC] Main: Main middle 3 banner (583 x 222, Unlimited exposure)
common:filter:banner-pc-5: [PC] Common: Product detail middle banner (1,050 x free, 1 piece)
common:filter:banner-mobile-1: [MOBILE] Common: Top logo (width less than 280 x height less than 60, 1 piece)
common:filter:banner-mobile-2: [MOBILE] Main: Main Visual Banner (1,000 x 548, Unlimited Slide Type)
common:filter:banner-mobile-3: [MOBILE] Main: Wide Banner (900 x free, Unlimited Exposure)
common:filter:title: Title
common:product-detailed:PC/MOBILE: Used together with PC/MOBILE detailed description
common:product-image:tip: When using automatic registration, individual images are automatically resized using representative images. (Thumbnail, list image)
common:product:control-best-review: Controls whether the best reviews are exposed on skins with best reviews.
common:product:exposure-condition: Even if it is set to Exposure, it will not be exposed if the exposure conditions are not met.
common:information-use:not-possible-basi: If exchange/return/refund is not possible - Basic
common:order-shipping:order-processing-r: Order processing, delivery processing, and cancellation processing are only possible through the detailed view. (Naver Pay Restrictions)
common:order-shipping:naver-pay-remind: Naver Pay order information cannot be settled. For Naver orders, please use Naver Pay Center.
common:order-shipping:is-the-naver-pay-o: is the Naver Pay order code.
common:order-shipping:sub-search-order-p: Naver Pay order information is managed separately.
common:order-shipping:is-based-on-all-or: is based on all orders with the same order number.
common:settle-status:the-settlement-amou: The settlement amount is the amount
common:settle-status:please-note-that: Please note that this is the status of the order for which payment has been confirmed and the shipping cost is not included in the total payment cost.
common:settle-waiting:information-on-aut: Information on automatic settlement waiting processing period
common:settle-waiting:this-period: This period is based on the completion of delivery.
product:frequently-options:enter-managem: Please enter the option management name.
product:frequently-options:exposure-chan: Option exposure method cannot be changed once registered.
product:frequently-options:order-changed: Option order cannot be changed once registered.
product:frequently-options:for-additiona: For additional options, only secondary options can be set by default, and option types cannot be selected.
product:frequently-options:you-can-regis: You can add option when create opntion set success and edit after
product:icon:exposure-ranking-info: The lower the exposure ranking, the first it appears, and if the ranking is the same, the recently registered icon appears first.
product:icon:icon-img-info: If you do not register the icon image (MOBILE), the icon of the icon image (PC) is exposed even on mobile.
product:icon:product_freedelivery_small_: Auto Apply Icon - Free Shipping ( 40 x 20 )
product:icon:product_name_small_icon: Auto Application Icon - Special Exhibition ( 40 x 20 )
product:hashtag-exposure-settings:set-ha: Set the hashtag exposure at the top of the product list.
product:hashtag-exposure-settings:title: Product list hashtag exposure setting
product:search-page:set-up-products: Set up products that other customers find the most
product:search-page:depending-on: Depending on the checked item, it will be displayed in the search conditions of the integrated search page.
product:search-page:you-can-set: You can set the products that are displayed when there is no search result in the integrated search.
product:product-detail:same-application: Same application of PC/MOBILE exposure items
product:product-detail:display-related: Display related products on the detail page
product:product-detail:it-is-exposed: It is exposed by a slide rolling method.
product:setting:address-tip: You can check after adding a category.
promotion:coupon-settings:this-setting: This setting can set whether to use all registered coupons.
promotion:coupon-settings:of-the-registe: of the registered coupon when set to
promotion:coupon-settings:coupons-cannot: Coupons cannot be used with or without.
promotion:coupon-settings:to-use-coupon-: Whether to use coupon restoration due to order cancellation
promotion:coupon-settings:will-be-restor: If set to , the coupons used for the canceled order will be restored. This setting can set whether to use all registered coupons.
promotion:coupon-settings:will-not-be-re: If set to , the used coupon will not be restored even if the order is cancelled.
promotion:coupon-settings:if-you-cancel: If you cancel the order before payment, the coupon will be restored regardless of the settings.
promotion:coupon-registration:of-the-ord: in the case of , the discount/accumulation is based on the order amount. (Shipping cost is also included.)
promotion:coupon-registration:of-the-shi: in this case, the discount will be based on the shipping cost.
promotion:coupon-registration:of-the-man: : The administrator can directly select and issue a member.
promotion:coupon-registration:of-the-aut: : Coupons that are automatically issued to members. Coupons are issued according to the automatic issuance settings.
promotion:coupon-registration:notice-cou: Coupon descriptions are for management purposes only and are not displayed on the user's page.
promotion:coupon-registration:notice-shi: in this case, the coupon type is
it can be set only when.
promotion:coupon-registration:notice-cou: For discount rate, enter only integers, not decimal points.
promotion:coupon-registration:available-: Available for payment of KRW or more.
promotion:coupon-registration:notice-cou: You can set whether to use the same coupon repeatedly.
promotion:coupon-registration:notice-fir: : When the customer completes the payment after the first purchase, a coupon is automatically issued.
promotion:coupon-registration:notice-pur: : When the customer completes the payment after purchase, a coupon is automatically issued.
promotion:coupon-registration:notice-hap: : After checking customer information, a coupon is automatically issued on the birthday.
promotion:coupon-registration:notice-joi: : When a customer registers as a member, a coupon is automatically issued.
promotion:event:state-of-use-notice-1: In the case of a free shipping event, it does not overlap with a separate free shipping coupon and takes priority.
promotion:event:state-of-use-notice-2: In case of free shipping event, it is finally applied at the time of order/payment.
promotion:event:state-of-use-notice-3: In the case of the free shipping event, it is applied to all set products regardless of the delivery policy and individual delivery, so be careful when using it. (However, additional shipping charges are not applied.)
promotion:event:event-period-notice: If the event period has passed, the event will not be applied regardless of the usage status.
promotion:event:during-the-event-period: During the event period, the total payment amount of the ordered product is the minimum
promotion:event:in-cas-of-more: In case of more than one won, the event is applied
promotion:event:minimum-payment-amount-n: In the case of the minimum payment amount, it is the total amount of the ordered products.
Note) The total amount of products is determined before coupons and points are used.
promotion:event:notice-event-search-1: Only attendance check events where the status of use is enabled will be processed.
promotion:event:notice-event-search-2: Only one attendance check event can be used at a time.
promotion:event:notice-event-search-3: If you change the usage status to use, other attendance check events with the usage status are automatically changed to stop.
promotion:event:notice-event-search-4.1: If attendance is checked more than once, all settings except “Use Status
promotion:event:notice-event-search-5: Induce access to the attendance check event page by entering the address of the access URL into a link such as a banner or pop-up window.
promotion:event:notice-state-of-use: If attendance is checked more than once, all settings below except for the usage status cannot be modified.
promotion:event:use-only-during-the-even: Use only during the event period
promotion:event:notice-participation-met: Cumulative participation type: Benefits are paid to members whose combined attendance during the event period exceeds a certain period
Consecutive Participation Type: Benefits are paid to members who attend for a certain period of time in a row during the event period
promotion:event:only-paid-once: Only paid once during the event period
promotion:event:paid-every-time: Paid every time attendance check conditions are satisfied during the event periodd
promotion:event:notice-compensation-paym: As for the compensation payment conditions, coupons and points can be paid at the same time.
If the payment deadline is '0 days', the benefits are paid immediately after the attendance check.

In the case of coupons, you can specify only those coupons whose issuance method is automatic issuance in Promotion > Coupon Management > Coupon Registration and whose setting is set to Attendance Check.
Coupons and points to be paid depend on each setting.
ex) If the number of coupon downloads is exceeded, payment will not be made and the coupon's unique settings will be followed.
promotion:event:notice-check-image-1: This is the title image displayed at the top when the attendance check is in progress.
promotion:event:notice-check-image-2: As for the title image, the image registered in the current event is exposed.
promotion:event:notice-project-exhibitio: Depending on the skin of the site, the size may be automatically adjusted. Standard size (515px * 190px)
promotion:event:notice-exhibition-conten: If the MOBILE is not registered, the PC contents are applied to the MOBILE. Standard size (1050px * Free)
